trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Council Bluffs
There were no other sightings in Council Bluffs on or around August 5th 2010
Summary: Small color changing; white, blue, and green quickly moving from left to right.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking up out my window at the stars, I spotted it becuse due to the bright blinking white light; but as I gazed out at it more carfuly I realized it was changing in random intervuls to blue and green as well as white. It moved in short distances from left to right and stopped breifly just to change colors. It seemed either very small or very big and a long way up. It looked like a star but it also looked like it could have been a bullet or diamond shape but I can't tell due to the distance. I seen it at exactly 3:38 am but it may have been there longger. I could not watch it as long as it was there due to a dissablity but I looked out every few minutes and it was still there.
